description:
Beucase the implementation is based on mysql specific error message, this method didn't throw correct exception with sqlite.

https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/stable/diablo/nova/db/sqlalchemy/models.py#L61


- sqlite error for duplication

(nova.exception): TRACE: IntegrityError: (IntegrityError) PRIMARY KEY must be unique u'INSERT INTO instances (created_at, updated_at, deleted_at, deleted, id, user_id, project_id, image_ref, kernel_id, ramdisk_id, server_name, launch_index, key_name, key_data, power_state, vm_state, task_state, memory_mb,

- Mysql error (primary key duplication)
sqlalchemy.exc.IntegrityError: (IntegrityError) (1062, "Duplicate entry '1' for key 'PRIMARY'") 'INSERT INTO names (id, text, date_time) VALUES (%s, %s, %s)' (1, 'world', datetime.date(2011, 11, 9))

-Mysql error (unique key duplication)
sqlalchemy.exc.IntegrityError: (IntegrityError) (1062, "Duplicate entry 'hello' for key 'text'") 'INSERT INTO names (id, text, date_time) VALUES (%s, %s, %s)' (2, 'hello', datetime.date(2011, 11, 9))
title: nova.db.sqlalchemy.models.NovaBase#save() didn't raise exception.Duplicate when we use sqlite

comments.content:
Beucase the implementation is based on mysql specific error message, this method didn't throw correct exception with sqlite.

https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/stable/diablo/nova/db/sqlalchemy/models.py#L61


- sqlite error for duplication

(nova.exception): TRACE: IntegrityError: (IntegrityError) PRIMARY KEY must be unique u'INSERT INTO instances (created_at, updated_at, deleted_at, deleted, id, user_id, project_id, image_ref, kernel_id, ramdisk_id, server_name, launch_index, key_name, key_data, power_state, vm_state, task_state, memory_mb,

- Mysql error (primary key duplication)
sqlalchemy.exc.IntegrityError: (IntegrityError) (1062, "Duplicate entry '1' for key 'PRIMARY'") 'INSERT INTO names (id, text, date_time) VALUES (%s, %s, %s)' (1, 'world', datetime.date(2011, 11, 9))

-Mysql error (unique key duplication)
sqlalchemy.exc.IntegrityError: (IntegrityError) (1062, "Duplicate entry 'hello' for key 'text'") 'INSERT INTO names (id, text, date_time) VALUES (%s, %s, %s)' (2, 'hello', datetime.date(2011, 11, 9))
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~nati-ueno

comments.content:
I fixed it but in future version..

https://review.openstack.org/#/q/status:merged+project:openstack/nova+branch:master+topic:bp/db-unique-keys,n,z
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~boris-42
